name: Rockstar Games Launcher

task.description: Installing the launcher (Don't login, close the window)
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- launcher: https://gamedownloads.rockstargames.com/public/installer/Rockstar-Games-Launcher.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/Launcher/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine 64-bit Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: arial
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Arial Font
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing the launcher (Don't login, close the window)
    exclude_processes: RockstarService.exe
    executable: launcher
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    description: Setting Windows 10 mode for Wine
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: lutris-rockstar-4.16-x86_64
